full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================

**Title**
--------

EF944-230089: Inspection and Maintenance of Generator Sets for Health Canada Building

**Solicitation Number**
--------------------

WS4265465759

**Publication Date**
------------------

2023-10-19

**Tender Closing Date**
----------------------

2023-12-19, 14:00:00 EST

**Description**
--------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada hereby invites suitably qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the provision of inspection and maintenance services for generator sets at the Health Canada building in Longueuil, QC. This request aims to secure the services of a contractor to perform preventive maintenance on petroleum product storage systems connected to generator sets, as well as the generator sets themselves. Regular maintenance will be carried out on a weekly, monthly, semi-annual, annual, and five-year basis to ensure the integrity of the generator sets.

**Key Information**
------------------

*   **Contract Duration:** November 2024
*   **Location:** Health Canada building, Longueuil, QC
*   **Trade Agreements:** This tender is open to contractors who have agreed to one or more of the following trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).
*   **Bid Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Method of Procurement:** Competitive bid

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Jessica Cossette Fontaine (SPAC/PSPC) can be contacted at:

*   **Email:** [jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.cossettefontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17761112?extsite=MTc3NjExMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17761112?extsite=MTc3NjExMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)[][1]
